refnamediv.refpurpose: returns number of members of a MULTI... or ...COLLECTION shape, 1 for other sorts of shapes.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: returns number of members of a MULTI... or ...COLLECTION shape, 1 for other sorts of shapes.

example.title: Simple Use
